attributes.additional_details:
Purchase utilities from the Government.

We should be able to purchase our power etc from a government source so the profit is retained by our country.

We are bombarded with suppliers of power that do not manufacture their product but just sell it on so why can we not buy from No11 direct.

The price could be linked to the average of the providers but we the country can reinvest the profits into our hospitals schools etc or reducing the debt burden
